text: Factor X is the adaptation of the original English The X Factor in Portugal, broadcast by SIC. A2. The 1st edition premiered on September 7, 2014. The presentation was in charge of João Manzarra and Cláudia Vieira. The winner was Kika Cardoso, who belonged to the adult category and whose mentor was Paulo Junqueiro. The castings were held from mid-February to the beginning of March of that same year, nationwide, at a time when the Vale Tudo program was also returning to SIC.
title: Factor X (Portugal - 2nd edition)
